```{r}
setwd("/Users/jrutsohn/Desktop/Spring 2020 Texts/BIOS 735/bank-additional")
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(psych)
library(scales)

data.test <- read.csv("bank-additional-full.csv",header=T,sep=';')

data.test$pdays[data.test$pdays==999] <- 0 #Never Contacted
data.test$pdays[data.test$pdays< 999] <- 1 #Was Contacted

pairs.panels(data.test[,-c(2:10,13,15,21)])

describe(data.test[,-c(2:10,13,15,21)])
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=job)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=marital)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=education)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=default)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=housing)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=loan)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=contact)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=month)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=day_of_week)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=poutcome)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=pdays)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=y)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
